Translations.deadspeak_bonemass: Takk, krigar. Me som levde vidare i denne forma vart lenge nekta freden av å døy. No går me...
Translations.deadspeak_eikthyr: Så du vart dauden min? Du ser så liten og mjuk ut… Sei ved Odin at jamvel om han har knust denne forma, vil villmarka aldri underkaste seg veldet hans...
Translations.deadspeak_elder: Lille sak av blod og bein, eg skulle ha brekt deg som ein kvist! No som eg visnar og døyr, lat det store treet ta meg...
Translations.deadspeak_fader: Eg fylgde ein falsk skjebne, og han gav meg ikkje anna enn øydelegging. Tilgje meg, min kjære...
Translations.deadspeak_fish_shared2: Ta meg med til elva... Kast meg i vatnet...
Translations.deadspeak_fish1: USIKKERT I'm a perch, not a bass!
Translations.deadspeak_fish2: USIKKERT You're supposed to put heads on a pike, not put a pike on a wall...
Translations.deadspeak_fish4: Det er så kaldt... Og mørkt... Men eg likar det slik.
Translations.deadspeak_fish6: Kva for ei ekkel lukt? Det er da vel ikkje meg!
Translations.deadspeak_fish7: Eg er daud, men ikkje vekke. Kan du ikkje setje meg fri frå denne skjærselden?
Translations.deadspeak_fish8: Har du nokon gong lurt på kva ein finn på botnen av havet? Gjer ikkje det. Slikt er det bettre å ikkje vete.
Translations.deadspeak_fish9: Kan du sjå lyset? Det kallar på deg...
Translations.deadspeak_fish10: Til laks åt alle kan ingen gjera.
Translations.deadspeak_fish12: Har du sett venninna mi? Ho heiter Anika.
Translations.deadspeak_hive: Du trur at du slo oss? Da tek du feil... Me er framleis, og vil for alltid vere bolet - og bolet er uslåeleg.
Translations.deadspeak_moder: Stikk byrgskapen i slira, Odinsbarn! Mitt lange velde er over, men dei som kjem etter meg er enda større...
Translations.deadspeak_queen: Sei til Odin at min ætt skal bere fram enda ein... Ei dronning døyr aldri.
Translations.deadspeak_yagluth: Kjem du for å braute, vesle kryp? Veit du kor mange gonger eg har vore drepen, knust, bannlyst, brent og gravlagt? Du er ikkje den fyrste og du vert ikkje den siste.
Translations.dream_ashlands01: Du vakner i ein draum med mørk himmel og rullande skyer. Natt på fjelltoppen, med ei enkel kappe pakka tett kring deg. Himmelen brest av tore. Varme glør regner ut av rifta og gjer draumekroppen til inkjes på ein augneblink…
Translations.dream_ashlands02: I draumen sit du krøkt i midten av ei vid og mørk hòle, medan eit veldig beist krinsar om deg med mørkret på slep. Logar av smaragdeld blaffar kring beistet, og det slepper ut eit brøl som du enno høyrer langt utpå morgonkvisten…
Translations.dream_ashlands03: Du drøymer at du et villsvin i eit gilde. Det er enkel, men framifrå mat. Om berre alle draumar hadde vore slik.
Translations.dream_ashlands04: Ni kvitkledde møyer dansar berrføtt ved midnatt. Ni vargar jagar ein kvit hjort i grønskogen. Ni bjøller kimar ut over fjellet, og så vaknar du.
Translations.dream_bonemass01: Du drøymer at hundre skrømt samlar seg kringom senga di, på jakt etter varme og liv. Så høyrer du dunking frå langt under jorda, og skrømta kvekk til, som smuler på eit trommeskinn, og er vekke.
Translations.dream_eikthyr01: Du drøymer at du spring gjennom ei eng, medan ein bleik eldebrann herjar på himmelen. Du høyrer ei dundring av hòvar bakfrå, men når du snur deg, ser du ingenting. Du vaknar, og hjartet bankar i brystet.
Translations.dream_elder01: I draumen reiser skogen seg opp framfor deg. Han dreg trea oppover med seg lik ei kappe og døl stjernene med mørkret sitt. På toppen av fjellet, vert månen ramma inn av eit veldig gevir...
Translations.dream_mistlands01: I draumen din går du gjennom ein gildehall full av flirande krigarar og fagre møyer. Du vert med på feiringa fram til du innser at du er naken, og det lille bronseskjoldet ditt ikkje er nok til å dølje skamma. Du vert letta når morgonen kjem.
Translations.dream_mistlands02: Mørkøygde Loke kjem til deg i draumen, og gjev deg ein ring til kvar hand. Han seier deg at så lenge dei vert på fingrane dine, vil du aldri meir høyre eit spottande ord. Du vaknar med fingrane i øyra.
Translations.dream_mistlands03: Du klyv opp ei vindeltrapp til toppen av eit høgt tårn. På toppen kan du sjå utover ein skog utan ende. Vinden blæs grøne bølgjer over tretoppane, og under overflata byrjar mørke skapnadar å røre seg...
Translations.dream_moder01: Du drøymer at du flyg over tindane. Heile Valheim breier seg ut under deg. Medan du kverv og gjer kolbytter i den kjølne lufta, stig ein stor skapnad opp forbi deg og skuggar for sola. Ho talar i mørkret. Finn meg.
Translations.dream_random01: Du drøymer om ei elv som renn oppover, om grøne skot som kverv attende ned i jorda…
Translations.dream_random02: Nok ein gong spring du i brodden for hæren din. Øksa til far din tyngjer handa di ned. Du vakner med eit krigsrop på leppene…
Translations.dream_random03: I draumen din sit du ved elden i ein stor hall, omringa av kjende røyster. Andleta deira kverv or syne i røyken, og du gløymer navna deira, men varmen frå minnet vert verande ei stund…
Translations.dream_random04: Du står på baugen til eit byksande skip, med sjøsprøyt forut og muntre måseskrik over deg. I dei djupe faldane på draumen hugsar du korleis det var å vere i live i fødelandet ditt.
Translations.dream_random05: Du drøymer om eit mektig tre som strekkjer seg ut gjennom natta. Helvta av greinene sprakar og brenn. Dei andre er grøne med lauv.
Translations.dream_random06: Omgjeve av sverdklang, på den mørke og doggvåte svevnsletta, veks eit snerrande andlet fram framfor deg. Skjoldarmen din heng slapt ned, spjutet ditt er knekt. Du tek den kalde sverdsegga imot med opne armar. Frå ein draum om daude vaknar du til dauden sjølv.
Translations.dream_random07: Du drøymer at du ligg på ryggen i ei eng og kik opp mot skyene. Du har ikkje eit namn, og hugen er lett. Men du held i ei varm hand. Du flirer i draumen. Men når du vaknar, er andletet tårevått.
Translations.dream_random08: På eit skip av mørkt tre, under slitne segl, ligg du med armane i kors over brystet. Uklare andlet, like fingermerke på mørkret, nynnar kjende songer medan dei skuvar deg ut på den svarte, blanke sjøen.
Translations.dream_random09: Du ligg på slagmarka med drøymande auge vent opp mot ein røyktilsløra himmel. Ropa til krigarane dine døyr ut, og auga dine lukkar seg enda ein gong. Store klør glir under deg, og du kjenner at du vert lyfta utor kroppen din, lik eit spedbarn or ei seng…
Translations.dream_random10: Du fell djupt ned i svevnbrunnen og drøymer berre om mørker.
Translations.dream_random11: Du drøymer om ein ljos hall fylt med edle krigarar og fagre møyer. Lufta er tjukk med sang, golvborda ynkar seg under tyngda av rykande rettar og mjøden strøymer som vatn. Du vaknar treigt, framleis med latter i øyra…
Translations.dream_random12: Du vrid deg i svevne med fælslege draumer. Mara er tung på brystet. Du vert letta når morgonen kjem.
Translations.dream_random13: Svevn er ei elv, og draumar er fisk. Du vaknar om morgononen med tomt garn.
Translations.dream_random14: Du drøymer at du jaktar med fellane dine. Du spring opp over grøne haugar og ned gjennom disige dalar. Bytet ditt snåvar framfor deg. Du byksar framover, og set tennene dine i varmt kjøt. Når du vaknar, har du framleis blodsmak på tunga.
Translations.dream_random15: Du drøymer at du går gjennom ein snødekt skog, og støyter på eit nakent barn som sit og stør seg mot eit tre. Auga hans er lukka, men brystet rører seg med andedrag. Du bøyer deg ned jamsides han, og skjøner at han har sove der, biande, i fleire hundre år. Når du tek han på aksla, vaknar de båe. Jævla pedo.
Translations.dream_random16: Du drøymer om ein mektig bjørn som søv djupt under jorda i verdsvinteren. Han vrid seg i svevne, faldar på faldar med kjøt og pels. Han har korkje hovud eller bein. Ein formlaus masse av bjørnekjøt, miskunnsamt still.
Translations.dream_random17: Du sovnar medan du planlegg arbeidet for morgondagen, og i draume gjer du deg ferdig. Du kløyver ved, sankar mat og jagar snøgge rådyr. Du kjem heim, sliten, men glad. Så vaknar du og skjønar at du har heile dagen framfor deg...
Translations.dream_yagluth01: I eit rom med gylne teppe på veggane kneler du framfor tronen til ein tilsløra konge. Svevna er berre ei maske, seier han, og lyfter sakte sløret. Du vaknar med eit skrik.
Translations.dvergr_buff_description: Du er påverka av ei framand dvergkraft som gjer deg sterkare.
Translations.enemy_boss_goblinking_spawnmessage: Den vridne sjela til Yagluth er påkalla
Translations.enemy_kvastur_lore: Fylgjesveinen til ei volve må vere laga av eit kraftig emne.
Translations.error_needslocalupdatetojoin: Du køyrer ei eldre utgåve av Valheim som ikkje er kompatibel med denne tenaren. Oppdater spelet for å kople til denne tenaren.
Translations.error_needsserverupdatetojoin: Denne tenaren køyrer ei eldre utgåve av Valheim som ikkje er kompatibel med utgåva di.
Translations.error_platformexcluded: Tenareigaren let ikkje brukarar frå andre plattformar enn den han sjølv nyttar spele på tenaren.
Translations.error_worldfileload: Feil ved innlasting av verdsfil. Sjekk sikringskopiar!
Translations.event_bonemassarmy_start: Ei fælsleg eim kjem frå myra...
Translations.event_ghosts_end: Du har lyst dei i bann, enn så lenge...
Translations.event_moderarmy_start: Ein kald vind blæs frå fjella
Translations.event_skeletons_end: Beinrangla er lei av å sloss
Translations.fish10_description: Denne fisken likar vatnet nesten frose.
Translations.fish11_description: Det vert sagt at denne fisken gyter i flytande magma!
Translations.fish12_description: Veldig god om han er laga til rett, men smaken kan vere litt kvass.
Translations.fish2_description: Ein ferskvassfisk som treng mykje krydder.
Translations.fish4_description: Han lever heile livet i mørker, så han treng ikkje auge.
Translations.fish5_description: Denne fisken er ein bråkmakar i lokale straumar.
Translations.fish6_description: Om han er sylta, luktar denne fisken verre enn myra han kjem frå.
Translations.fish8_description: Han har sett nokre ting... Nokre veldig fæle ting...
Translations.fish9_description: Ljoset gjer det lettare å sjå det pene lille andletet!
Translations.guardianstone_bonemass_desc:
Vandrar, sjå på føtene dine
Som trår på grava vår
Tusen bein utan kjøt
Vil dra deg under
Translations.guardianstone_eikthyr_desc:
Geviret hans er jarngreiner
Dei knuser stein og jamnar fjell med jorda
Hóvane hans er ljoden av tore
Stemmen ein ulande storm
Translations.guardianstone_fader_desc:
Ein far, edel og byrg
Han svevde gjennom himmeleld
Så senka vanvitet sløret sitt
Og vreid om hjartevilja hans
Translations.guardianstone_moder_desc:
Svarte vengjer over måne og sol
Ned frå fjellet kjem vår mor
Tårane hennar vil falle som regn
Røysta hennar vil kalle oss heim
Translations.guardianstone_theelder_desc:
Fyrst av Skogen, Konge av røter
Drott over dei som bur ved hans føter
Han spreier sine røter der byar stod
Et deira kjøt og drikk deira blod
Translations.guardianstone_thequeen_desc:
Fødd i rustning
Mor til mange
Dronning utan krone
Herskar under
Translations.guardianstone_yagluth_desc:
For lenge sidan, ei krone han bar
Under kvelvingen, raud som blod
Det er ikkje meir av alt som han var
Men sjela hans lever enno
Translations.heightmap_issue_message: USIKKERT To fix a critical issue with the world map not being in sync, small parts of worlds for some players will be changed. Any structures built close to those areas may potentially break. We try our best to ensure that these issues do not happen, but sometimes it’s unavoidable and we are truly sorry for any inconvenience.
Translations.hud_hidden_messagehud_notification: Skrudde av HUD. Trykk Ctrl + F3 for å skru på
Translations.hud_hidden_messagehud_notification_gamep: Skrudde av HUD. For å skru på, trykk
Translations.hud_maxsummonsreached: Daudevekkjaren din er ikkje sterk nok til å kalle på fleire.
Translations.hud_maxsummonsreached_greenroots: Villmarksstaven din er ikkje sterk not til å kalle på fleire.
Translations.hud_maxsummonsreached_trollstav: Trollstaven din er ikkje sterk not til å kalle på fleire.
Translations.invalid_keybind_text: Du kan ikkje binde denne handlinga til tasten du har valt
Translations.inventory_onlyoneingredient: Denne oppskrifta krev berre éin av ingrediensane som er viste.
Translations.item_ancientroot_empty: Den eldgamle rota ser heilt uttørka ut
Translations.item_ancientroot_full: Den eldgamle rota pulsar med energi
Translations.item_ancientroot_half: Gløden frå den eldgamle rota falmer
Translations.item_ancientseed_description: Når du held det mot øyret, høyrer du kviskring frå innsida...
Translations.item_arrow_bronze_description: Kvassare enn flint. Ein skinande bodbringar frå Dauden.
Translations.item_arrow_carapace_description: Tung og kvass, denne gjer vondt.
Translations.item_arrow_charred_description: Denne pila er spikka frå eit forkola lårbein, og er hard som metall.
Translations.item_arrow_fire_description: Denne pila setjer fyr på kva enn ho treffer.
Translations.item_arrow_flint_description: Ein skinnbrytar med hovud av flint.
Translations.item_arrow_poison_description: Eit bittert stikk frå langt unna.
Translations.item_arrow_silver_description: Ei nål som roar rastlause ånder.
Translations.item_arrow_wood_description: Ei pil spikka ut av tre.
Translations.item_askbladder_description: Ei sur lukt heng framleis att.
Translations.item_askhide_description: Dette hardføre lêret er tjukt og framleis varmt.
Translations.item_asksvin_egg_description: Hardt som fjell, men du kan anse noko på innsida. Du bør halde det varmt.
Translations.item_asksvin_meat_cooked_description: Dette kjøtet har ein kraftig og mogen smak. Jamvel er det veldig godt om du steikjer det rett.
Translations.item_asksvin_meat_description: Luktar røyk, sjølv om det er rått.
Translations.item_asksvincarrionneck_description: Ein hals som syng på siste verset.
Translations.item_asksvincarrionribcage_description: Desse sidebeina er gnegne heilt reine.
Translations.item_asksvincarrionskull_description: Ein tjukk skalle med plass til ein overraskande stor hjerne.
Translations.item_atgeir_blackmetal_description: Ei frykteleg øks av nesten uknuseleg svartmetall.
Translations.item_atgeir_himminafl_description: Det er kanskje ikkje ein hamar, men Tor sjølv hadde likte dette våpenet.
Translations.item_atgeir_wood_description: Han gjer kanskje ikkje så vondt, men han når langt!
Translations.item_axe_berzerkr_blood_description: Jo nærmare dauda du er, dess hardare slår du.
Translations.item_axe_berzerkr_description: Lat raseriet take over og snu deg mot slaktinga.
Translations.item_axe_berzerkr_lightning_description: Blodbadet spreier seg når du svingar desse øksene, slik at Tor sjølv hadde vore stolt.
Translations.item_axe_berzerkr_nature_description: Villdyret i deg tek over, og naturen rundt deg strekkjer ut ei hand.
Translations.item_axe_blackmetal_description: Ei fullkomen jamvektig øks smidd frå eit mørkt metall med smaragdglimt.
Translations.item_axe_bronze_description: Eit blankpolert blad, bøygd som eit glis.
Translations.item_axe_iron_description: Skarp og sterk, ven av vedhoggaren.
Translations.item_axe_jotunbane_description: Ikkje ein gong dei gamle kjempane kunne lide eit giftig bit frå dette våpenet.
Translations.item_axe_stone_description: Ei enkel øks til å hogge ned tre.
Translations.item_axe_wood_description: Hadde det ikkje vore rart om denne øksa kunne hogge ved?
Translations.item_barberkit_description: Eit eigna sett for dei fjongaste frisørar.
Translations.item_barrelrings_description: Desse metallringane er heilt runde, slik at dei lett kan halde saman ei tynne. Du treng berre å leggje til treverk!
Translations.item_battleaxe_blackmetal_description: Grønt vert det siste fiendane dine ser før du kløyver dei i to.
Translations.item_battleaxe_crystal_description: Du kan sjå gjennom ho, og ho kan slå gjennom deg.
Translations.item_battleaxe_skullsplittur_description: Finner skallar å kløyve, sjølv i den tjukkaste skodda.
Translations.item_battleaxe_wood_description: Skremmande, men ikkje så skremmande som ei ekte ei.
Translations.item_beechseeds_description: Plant dei, så får du eit bøketre.
Translations.item_bellfragment_description: Dette eldgamle brotet verkar å kome frå ei knust bjølle...
Translations.item_bilebag_description: Tærande gall frå liket av ein gjall.
Translations.item_birchseeds_description: Plant dei, så får du ei bjørk.
Translations.item_bjorn_meat_description: Dette feite kjøtet skulle ein gong halde ein bjørn i live gjennom vinterdvalen.
Translations.item_bjornhide_description: Ein tjukk og loden fell. Gròv, men framleis mjuk.
Translations.item_bjornpaw_description: Skarpe klør, eigna til å plukke bær – eller til å lemleste.
Translations.item_blackcore_description: Fylt til randa med eldgamal kraft.
Translations.item_blackmarble_description: Ei solid steinblokk med skiftande leter i saumane.
Translations.item_blackmetal_description: Ein tung barre av mørkt metall.
Translations.item_blackmetalscrap_description: Ein vriden klump med mørkt metall.
Translations.item_blacksoup_description: Ei fullkomen jamvekt av søte og syre.
Translations.item_blackwood_description: Treverk herda av eld og oske.
Translations.item_blobvial_description: Tjukk nok til å halde på noko flyktig, men skøyr nok til å verte knust.
Translations.item_bloodclot_description: Ver varsam så han ikkje sprekk medan du ber han...
Translations.item_blueberries_description: Bitte små, men gode på smak.
Translations.item_bolt_blackmetal_description: Ein blank bolt av mørkt metall.
Translations.item_bolt_bone_description: Ein bolt, grovt skoren ut av gulna bein.
Translations.item_bolt_charred_description: Eit kraftig bein frå ein underarm, forma til ein daudbringande bolt.
Translations.item_bombblob_frost_description: Om du held ho for lenge, kan handa di fryse fast.
Translations.item_bombblob_lava_description: Flaska kjennest varm ut, og varslar brann og øydelegging.
Translations.item_bombblob_poison_description: Det er tilrådeleg å vere varsam om denne flaska knusar.
Translations.item_bombblob_tar_description: Det kleimne emnet på innsida pulsar, liksom på trugande vis.
Translations.item_bonemawmeat_cooked_description: Det vart ikkje påverka av kokande sjø, men å steike kjøtet over open eld gjorde det herleg sprøtt.
Translations.item_bonemawscale_description: Ser nett ut som bein. Best å ikkje tenkje for mykje over samansetjinga til denne skapningen...
Translations.item_bonemawtooth_description: Har drepe mang ein modig sjømann.
Translations.item_bow_ashlands_description: Reist att or oska, denne boga held ukueleg styrke.
Translations.item_bow_ashlandsblood_description: Piler du skyt or denne boga skjer gjennom kjøt med blodtørste utan like.
Translations.item_bow_ashlandsroot_description: Som ei vridande grein was made to seek the sun, this bow was made to seek the slaughter.
Translations.item_bow_ashlandsstorm_description: Lat pilene dine fly snøgt som lynet.
Translations.item_bow_draugrfang_description: Utskoren i mørkt tre og spent opp med ei glitrande sene. Ein frykteleg ting.
Translations.item_bow_finewood_description: Ei enkel boge i sterkt og spenstig tre.
Translations.item_bow_huntsman_description: Satt i stand på meisterleg vis. Som or draumen til ein jeger.
Translations.item_bow_snipesnap_description: Du kan brått skade ryggen i freistnaden på å spenne denne boga, men det er ho verd.
Translations.item_bronze_description: Ei sterk legering av kopar og tinn.
Translations.item_bronzenails_description: Vert nytta både til skip og innbu.
Translations.item_bronzescrap_description: Det er gamalt og eira, men kan smeltast og nyttast om att.
Translations.item_bug_meat_cooked_description: Saftig kvitt kjøt. Nesten utan like.
Translations.item_bug_meat_description: Når du kjem deg gjennom skalet, finn du møyrt og saftig kjøt på innsida.
Translations.item_candlewick_description: Når du støypar desse inn i voks, får du eit koseleg ljos som brenn lenge.
Translations.item_cape_ash_description: Kappa har eit vakkert mønster vove inn med fin metalltråd, lik ei skjebne voven av Nornene sjølve.
Translations.item_cape_asksvin_description: Denne tjukke kappa fangar vinden, mest som seglet på eit skip.
Translations.item_cape_feather_description: Kappa gjer at du kjenner deg lettare, mest som om du kan flyge!
Translations.item_cape_lox_description: Fellen frå eit av dei veldige beista. Han er tjukk og varm.
Translations.item_cape_odin_description: Dei fremste krigarane til Odin skal ha det finaste tøyet.
Translations.item_cape_wolf_description: Vargen er fødd til å overleve. Denne hadde bare uflaks. No held fellen hans deg varm i snøen.
Translations.item_carrotseeds_description: Plant desse om du tykkjer om gulrøter...
Translations.item_carrotsoup_description: Ei varm og velsmakande suppe laga på gulrøter.
Translations.item_catapult_training_ammo_description: Ladning for katapultar. Sjå opp for knuselege ting.
Translations.item_celestialfeather_description: Einaste leivd etter ei fallen valkyrje.
Translations.item_ceramicplate_description: Kor varm utsida av plata enn vert, held innsida seg merkeleg kjølen.
Translations.item_charcoalresin_description: Kvae frå eit tre som vart tent på i ei forn æve. Enno budd på å brenne litt til.
Translations.item_charredbone_description: Etterfølgt av ein skarp stank av svidd kjøt.
Translations.item_charredcogwheel_description: Dette kan vere nyttig i ymse snedige innretninger...
Translations.item_charredskull_description: Den svartsvidde hovudskallen til ein krigar som døydde for lenge sidan. Ei høveleg gravferd kan nok ikkje gje han fred no.
Translations.item_chest_berserker_description: Om desse innfløkte mønstera kan verne om krigarar frå fjerne land, er dei sikkert gode nok for deg òg.
Translations.item_chest_berserker_undead_description: Laga av dei knuste beina til ein plaga bjørn.
Translations.item_chest_carapace_description: Ei brystplate gjord av eit slipa ryggskjold frå eit kjempeinsekt.
Translations.item_chest_dress1_description: Ein enkel brun kjole med blå underkjole.
Translations.item_chest_dress2_description: Ein brun kjole med eit sjal som står til. Varm og stilig!
Translations.item_chest_dress3_description: Ein pen brun kjole med perler og sylvspenner. Framifrå til gilde!
Translations.item_chest_dress4_description: Ein enkel blå kjole med raud underkjole.
Translations.item_chest_dress5_description: Ein blå kjole med eit grønt sjal over akslene. Varm og stilig!
Translations.item_chest_dress6_description: Ein pen blå kjole med perler og bronsespenner. Framifrå til gilde!
Translations.item_chest_dress7_description: Ein enkel gul kjole med grøn underkjole.
Translations.item_chest_dress8_description: Ein gul kjole med eit lilla sjal over akslene. Varm og stilig!
Translations.item_chest_dress9_description: Ein pen gul kjole med perler og sylvspenner. Framifrå til gilde!
Translations.item_chest_fenris_description: Beistet drog anden djupt, så ulet kunne høyrast på lang veg.
Translations.item_chest_flametal_description: Denne samansetnaden av gåtefullt flammetall og forkola bein vernar betre enn noko som finst i Midgard.
Translations.item_chest_harvester1_description: Når ein arbeider på jordet, er det viktig med høvelege klede. Ein stutt kjortel slepper inn kjølen luft.
Translations.item_chest_harvester2_description: Når ein arbeider på jordet, er det viktig med høvelege klede. Denne lange kjolen dekkjer til knea dine medan du arbeider.
Translations.item_chest_hildir_description: Tilhøyrer Hildir. Gje attende om du finn ho.
Translations.item_chest_iron_description: Ei skjelrustning av jarn. Gjev berre etter for dei sterkaste slag.
Translations.item_chest_mage_ashlands_description: Imbued with the power of the first sorceress, these robes will grant a boon to any who seeks to wield the ancient art of magic.
Translations.item_chest_mage_description: These artfully layered robes have spells and charms sewn into every seam and fold.
Translations.item_chest_medium_ashlands_description: The first man in Midgard knew how to guard his most vital organs, perhaps with a breastplate just like this one.
Translations.item_chest_pcuirass_description: Finely wrought and strong enough to turn even the sharpest blades.
Translations.item_chest_root_description: A light armour oddly woven together by ancient roots and bark.
Translations.item_chest_trollleather_description: Trolls are hard to skin but their leather is tough and warm.
Translations.item_chest_tunic1_description: A plain blue tunic, brightly dyed.
Translations.item_chest_tunic10_description: A simple tunic for everyday wear.
Translations.item_chest_tunic2_description: A blue tunic, worn with a fashionable cape made from fine brown wool.
Translations.item_chest_tunic3_description: A blue tunic worn with beads and silver jewelry. Sure to attract attention from other vikings.
Translations.item_chest_tunic4_description: A plain red tunic, brightly dyed.
Translations.item_chest_tunic5_description: A red tunic, worn with a fashionable cape made from fine green wool.
Translations.item_chest_tunic6_description: A red tunic worn with beads and bronze jewelry. Sure to attract attention from other vikings.
Translations.item_chest_tunic7_description: A plain yellow tunic, brightly dyed.
Translations.item_chest_tunic8_description: A yellow tunic, worn with a fashionable cape made from fine purple wool.
Translations.item_chest_tunic9_description: A yellow tunic worn with beads and silver jewelry. Sure to attract attention from other vikings.
Translations.item_chest_wolf_description: A wolfskin jerkin, warm and wild-looking. It protects against the cold.
Translations.item_chicken_egg_description: Keep it warm to see what comes out.. but what came first, really?
Translations.item_chicken_meat_description: All chickens bear the ancestral curse of being delicious.
Translations.item_copper_description: A bar of pure copper ready to be worked.
Translations.item_copperore_description: Unrefined copper. Needs to be refined in a smelter.
Translations.item_copperscrap_description: One person's scrap is another person's treasure.
Translations.item_crossbow_ripper_blood_description: Ready to rend your enemies to pieces.
Translations.item_crossbow_ripper_description: Rips your foes apart, simple as that.
Translations.item_crossbow_ripper_lightning_descripti: The bolts will tear through your enemies like a particularly nasty gale.
Translations.item_crossbow_ripper_nature_description: If the bolt doesn't pin your foe in place, the roots surging up from the ground surely will.
Translations.item_cryptkey_description: Partly covered in caked mud, it smells foetid.
Translations.item_crystal_description: A shard of crystal from deep within the earth.
Translations.item_cultivator_description: A farming tool for tilling soil.
Translations.item_curedsquirrelhamstring_description: Elastic and strong. This tendon must have come from a quick and agile animal.
Translations.item_damagemultipliertotal: Damage increase based on total health missing
Translations.item_dandelion_description: Some call it a weed, but it's pretty nonetheless.
Translations.item_deerhide_description: A cleaned hide from a deer.
Translations.item_demister_description: A bound wisp to guide you through the thickest of mists.
Translations.item_dragonegg_description: Far heavier than it looks, with a faint humming sound from within.
Translations.item_dragontear_description: The last frozen tear of a dragon, pulsating with mysterious energy.
Translations.item_dvergrkey_description: An object used to break a Dverger seal.
Translations.item_dvergrkeyfragment_description: A fragment of a Dvergr sealbreaker.
Translations.item_dvergrneedle_description: Looks like a perfect piece for piercing something...
Translations.item_dvergrtankard_description: It can hold a lot of mead!
Translations.item_Dyrnwyn_blade_description: Parts of an old blade. If all the pieces were reassembled it could likely be made whole.
Translations.item_Dyrnwyn_hilt_description: The hilt of a long forgotten sword. Perhaps it could be reforged if one had all the pieces...
Translations.item_Dyrnwyn_tip_description: This shard of metal looks like the tip of a sword. One might be able to reforge the blade if more pieces are found...
Translations.item_ectoplasm_description: A restless essence of a once living thing...
Translations.item_eitr_description: This is the stuff of life, the poison that consumes itself. The Dvergr refine it to use in their esoteric designs.
Translations.item_entrails_description: A slimy length of something's insides.
Translations.item_fader_drop_description: The mystical power will be revealed another day.
Translations.item_feastashlands_description: It's hard to tell whether the steam coming off of this dish is because it's freshly cooked or because of the asksvin meat in it. Either way, the spiced meat together with the vineberries and fiddlehead sprouts is so delicious that it doesn't matter!
Translations.item_feastblackforest_description: You won't be able to resist this platter of delights from the Black Forest! Venison sirloin steaks are served together with spiced thistles and carrots, and the whole meal is tied together with delicious jams. Just have one more bite!
Translations.item_feaster_description: Set the table with whatever food and drink you fancy, and impress your guests with a delicious feast. <color=yellow>Once a feast has been eaten of, it won't return any resources if dismantled.
Translations.item_feaster_remove_description: <color=yellow>Once a feast has been eaten of, it won't return any resources if dismantled.
Translations.item_feastmeadows_description: A boar that has been roasted to perfection, glazed and served atop a bed of greens, with additional cuts of meat on the side. A feast like this is sure to fill your stomach and brighten your day!
Translations.item_feastmistlands_description: The time has come for mushroom enthusiasts to rejoice! Try different kinds of mushrooms, mushroom marinated seeker meat and mushroom-filled misthare, and don't miss out on the tasty sap dressing.
Translations.item_feastmountains_description: Gather around this steaming pot full of deliciousness and warm yourselves up again after a day out in the cold. The usually tough and chewey wolf meat has become tender enough to practically melt in your mouth, and the onions and carrots are made even tastier with exciting spices.
Translations.item_feastoceans_description: Fish, fish, and more fish! And also serpent meat, cut to look like fish! Explore the flavours of the Ocean, along with some grilled greens for those still practicing their sea legs.
Translations.item_feastplains_description: There's nothing plain about this feast! Enjoy pies and loaves fresh from the oven, both sweet and savoury, and experience the culinary equivalent of a hug.
Translations.item_feastswamps_description: Who knew that leeches were edible? With the correct preparation (lots of cooking and lots of seasoning) you will be able to serve them in this feast for the culinary brave. For those who have a sensitive stomach, there are also tasty skewers of sausages and turnips on the side.
Translations.item_fierysvinstew_description: This musty stew is a necessity on every adventurer's menu.
Translations.item_finewood_description: High quality wood for fine carpentry.
Translations.item_fircone_description: Plant it to grow a fir tree.
Translations.item_fish_cooked_description: A tasty side of smoked fish.
Translations.item_fishandbread_description: Bounty from both land and sea.
Translations.item_fishingbait_ashlands_description: Some fish already like it where the waters are warm, and this bait brings the temperature close to boiling.
Translations.item_fishingbait_cave_description: This bait doesn't look like much, but it's a treat to fish that live where it's cold and dark.
Translations.item_fishingbait_deepnorth_description: It's not very nutritious, so the only fish that'll take this bait are the ones that are used to just eating ice.
Translations.item_fishingbait_description: Common dvergr fishing bait. Fishing rod sold separately.
Translations.item_fishingbait_forest_description: Dead trolls in the forest often attract a fish or two, speed up the process with this bait!
Translations.item_fishingbait_mistlands_description: A bait to guide the fish to you through shrouded waters.
Translations.item_fishingbait_ocean_description: This bait sinks deep, deep enough to lure the fish swimming along the very bottom of the sea.
Translations.item_fishingbait_plains_description: You're not immune to deathsquito bites, and the fish here aren't immune to this snack!
Translations.item_fishingbait_swamp_description: It might smell foul, but the fish drawn to this bait are used to so much worse.
Translations.item_fishwraps_description: Bread and fish, what more to wish?
Translations.item_fistweapon_bjorn_undead_description: These claws will rend flesh and bone alike.
Translations.item_fistweapon_fenris_description: If claws work for wolves, why not for a viking?
Translations.item_flametal_description: According to legend, this metal was used by the gods themselves to craft powerful weapons.
Translations.item_flametal_old_description: A withered metal from ancient times. No one knows what it was once used for.
Translations.item_flametalore_description: Warm to the touch with glowing veins of strange metal. Needs to be refined in a blast furnace.
Translations.item_flax_description: Unspun fibers from a flax plant.
Translations.item_flint_description: Can be shaped into sharp blades.
Translations.item_fragrantbundle_description: These plants carry a strong but pleasant scent. However, it's possible that not all creatures agree...
Translations.item_freezegland_description: This mysterious organ keeps a perfect temperature.
Translations.item_freshseaweed_description: The saltwater scent of this plant makes you think of the wide open ocean.
Translations.item_gemstone_blue_description: Light is reflected sharply off of this gem, or does it come from within the stone itself?
Translations.item_gemstone_green_description: This gem pulses with energy, almost as if it were a living thing.
Translations.item_gemstone_red_description: You wonder how many deals have been made to appease this gem. How many palms have bled onto it in exchange for its power?
Translations.item_goblintotem_description: Channels the ancient power of Yagluth.
Translations.item_greydwarfeye_description: The milky eyeball of a Greydwarf.
Translations.item_hammer_description: With this to your hand, you can raise high halls and mighty fortifications.
Translations.item_hardantler_description: A piece of very hard antlers.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge1: Fear not death, for the hour of your doom is set, and no man can escape it.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge10: You can keep as quiet as you like, but one day, someone will find you.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge11: No matter how much suffering you went through, you never want to let go of those memories.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge12: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what the storm is all about.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge13: A rock feels no pain, and an island never cries.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge2: Better to fight and fall than to live without hope.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge3: Runes shall you find, and rightly read, of wondrous weight and mighty magic.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge4: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge5: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge6: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge7: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge8: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
Translations.item_hardrock_knowledge9: Whatever it is you’re seeking won’t come in the form you’re expecting.
Translations.item_hare_meat_description: The meat of a hare is scant but toothsome.
Translations.item_helmet_berserker_description: Let the primal rage of a mighty bear consume you.
Translations.item_helmet_berserker_undead_description: Inspiring fear in foes and courage in kin when worn.
Translations.item_helmet_bronze_description: This will help to keep your brains inside your skull.
Translations.item_helmet_bronzehorned_description: A bronze helmet with attached horns for extra awesomeness.
Translations.item_helmet_carapace_description: People might say you look like a giant ant. But they will only say it once.
Translations.item_helmet_dverger_description: A portable perpetual lightsource for the dungeon explorer.
Translations.item_helmet_fenris_description: The eyes of the beast were wise and knowing, so that it could measure the strength of a warrior in one glance.
Translations.item_helmet_fishinghat_description: This catchy hat may only be reeled in by the most seasoned adventurers.
Translations.item_helmet_flametal_description: While you're wearing this helmet, your enemies will think twice before trying to bite your head off.
Translations.item_helmet_hat10_description: A simple yet fashionable purple cap.
Translations.item_helmet_hat3_description: A warm fur cap, made from the finest leather.
Translations.item_helmet_hat4_description: A warm cap for special occasions.
Translations.item_helmet_hat5_description: A simple yet fashionable red cap.
Translations.item_helmet_hat8_description: A warm fur cap, made from the finest wool.
Translations.item_helmet_hat9_description: A warm cap for special occasions.
Translations.item_helmet_iron_description: A helm of polished iron, fit for a hero.
Translations.item_helmet_mage_ashlands_description: Even the first sorceress valued the mystique of covering one's face. It is rumoured that honouring her this way will make your spells even more powerful.
Translations.item_helmet_mage_description: Sorcery shows itself in the eyes, so most mages wear cowls to disguise their occult pursuits.
Translations.item_helmet_medium_ashlands_description: As the first man of Midgard, Ask knew it was important to not draw too much attention to himself.
Translations.item_helmet_midsummercrown_description: Celebrate summer with a crown woven from flowers.
Translations.item_helmet_odin_description: Odin's finest warriors deserve the finest cloth.
Translations.item_helmet_root_description: Your head fits perfectly inside this knot of roots and bark.
Translations.item_helmet_strawhat_description: The perfect way to avoid sunstroke.
Translations.item_helmet_trollleather_description: Trollskin is hard to work but makes exceptional armour.
Translations.item_helmet_witchhat_description: This hat is sure to add a bit of magical flair to any outfit.
Translations.item_helmet_yule_description: A red cap in the style of house gnomes.
Translations.item_hildirkey_description: It seems to be missing its owner...
Translations.item_hoe_description: A farmer's tool for working the earth.
Translations.item_honeyglazedchicken_description: Grilled to perfection. Makes both eyes and mouths water.
Translations.item_iron_description: A bar of pure iron ready to be worked.
Translations.item_ironore_description: Unrefined iron. Needs to be refined in a smelter.
Translations.item_ironpit_description: An empty vessel waiting to be filled with firewood and kindling.
Translations.item_ironscrap_description: It's old and rusty but can be smelted and used again.
Translations.item_jotunpuffs_description: Swollen with magic, these golden orbs bubble from the ground where the Jotun fell.
Translations.item_juteblue_description: Made from natural fibers and dvergr hair.
Translations.item_knife_blackmetal_description: A darkling blade. Strong and sharp.
Translations.item_knife_butcher_description: A butcher's knife designed specifically for slaughtering tamed animals.
Translations.item_knife_skollandhati_description: Stab once for those who've betrayed you, and twice for those you hate.
Translations.item_knife_wood_description: Some people would say this knife is better for butter.
Translations.item_lantern_description: A simple torch would just be so old fashioned.
Translations.item_lavabomb_description: With enough heat, it solidifies upon explosion.
Translations.item_leatherscraps_description: A small pile of leather scraps.
Translations.item_legs_berserker_description: It covers all the important bits, but not much else.
Translations.item_legs_berserker_undead_description: Thick hides and bone fragments woven into a rugged skirt.
Translations.item_legs_bronze_description: Bronze greaves to shield your legs.
Translations.item_legs_carapace_description: Leg guards of a rigid carapace.
Translations.item_legs_fenris_description: The legs of the beast were lean and strong, so that it could leap great strides.
Translations.item_legs_flametal_description: Heavy trousers insulate against the heat, while solid greaves keep your shins safe from low blows.
Translations.item_legs_iron_description: Iron greaves to protect your legs.
Translations.item_legs_leather_description: They squeak a little when you walk.
Translations.item_legs_mage_ashlands_description: Whether or not the first sorceress actually wore trousers exactly like these, we can never know.
Translations.item_legs_mage_description: The trousers worn by mages are always especially tight. Discomfort fuels the focus that is needed for magic...
Translations.item_legs_medium_ashlands_description: The first man to roam Midgard preferred to tread lightly. Wearers of these trousers could learn a thing or two from him.
Translations.item_legs_root_description: A light armour oddly woven together by ancient roots and bark.
Translations.item_linenthread_description: A fine linen thread made out of a strong flax filament.
Translations.item_loxmeat_cooked_description: A great hunk of tender meat, food fit for Valhalla!
Translations.item_loxmeat_description: A raw slab of marbled meat.
Translations.item_loxpelt_description: A heavy pelt of thick, musty fur.
Translations.item_loxpie_description: Break the crust to release a cloud of fragrant steam. Delicious!
Translations.item_mace_eldner_blood_description: The blood all but soaks into this mace, and it always yearns for more.
Translations.item_mace_eldner_description: Dense yet spiked flametal, perfect for bashing enemy faces in.
Translations.item_mace_eldner_nature_description: If the force of your blow isn't enough to knock your enemies to the ground, perhaps the primal roots will hold them down for you.
Translations.item_mace_iron_description: A fist-sized lump of iron on a wooden shaft.
Translations.item_mace_needle_description: A deadly weapon, bristling with fiendish spikes.
Translations.item_mace_silver_description: The dead fear silver. Remind them why.
Translations.item_mace_wood_description: One has to wonder why someone made this instead of a simple club.
Translations.item_magecap_description: The delicate blue magecaps crackle like nerve-endings with sorcerous vitality.
Translations.item_mandible_description: The hand of man could hardly design a more perfect weapon.
Translations.item_marinatedgreens_description: It's spicy, it's chewy, it's sweet… This mad dish tickles your tongue as well as your mind.
Translations.item_mashedmeat_description: Leftover meat can actually be pretty tasty if you just mash it right!
Translations.item_mead_bugrepellent_description: The perfect drink for a day in the Plains.
Translations.item_mead_bzerker_description: Something poisonous stirs within, brewed to the point where its potential can finally be harnessed. But be careful to let the beast out...
Translations.item_mead_hasty_description: The squirrel must be quick on its feet as it runs up and down the trunk of the world tree. Although it no longer visits Valheim, there are still those who remember it...
Translations.item_mead_lightfoot_description: This bottle is full, yet it feels like it weighs almost nothing at all.
Translations.item_mead_strength_description: What creature can carry more than a troll? Why, a viking with this drink of course!
Translations.item_mead_swimmer_description: You feel invigorated just by holding this, as the ocean beckons you to come for a swim.
Translations.item_mead_tamer_description: It smells like a pigsty. Likely the taste won't be much better.
Translations.item_mead_tasty_description: The nectar of the Gods, divine mead.
Translations.item_mead_trollpheromones_description: An intense musk permeates the air around this bottle.
Translations.item_meat_cooked_description: Roasted on the bone, fit for a feast.
Translations.item_meat_raw_description: A raw piece of meat, cook it for a tasty treat.
Translations.item_meat_rotten_description: There are maggots crawling in the meat. It smells awful.
Translations.item_mechanicalspring_description: A mysterious contraption built by the Dvergr. Used to build traps.
Translations.item_mincemeatsauce_description: Chunks of goodness in a thick gravy.
Translations.item_moltencore_description: Potent energy swirls within, ready to be unleashed.
Translations.item_morgenheart_description: It's hard to believe it has ever beaten.
Translations.item_mushroom_bzerker_description: Some say you can eat everything you find in the forest. That is not the case with this mushroom.
Translations.item_mushroomblue_description: Glows with a soft blue hue.
Translations.item_mushroomomelette_description: A delicious omelette with an earthy aftertaste.
Translations.item_necktail_description: Inedible when raw, but proves to be quite a tasty snack if cooked.
Translations.item_necktailgrilled_description: This savoury, charcoal-grilled meat has a slight aroma of seaweed and grass.
Translations.item_needle_description: The pointy end of a Deathsquito.
Translations.item_oakseeds_description: Plant them to grow an oak tree.
Translations.item_onionseeds_description: Plant to grow a healthy onion.
Translations.item_ooze_description: Rotten and putrid-smelling. Why do you want this?
Translations.item_pickaxe_antler_description: This tool is hard enough to crack even the most stubborn rocks.
Translations.item_pickaxe_blackmetal_description: A good strong pick of glistening dark metal.
Translations.item_pickaxe_bronze_description: A good bronze pick. Can break very hard rocks.
Translations.item_pickaxe_iron_description: A sturdy tool of hardened iron.
Translations.item_pinecone_description: Plant it to grow a pine tree.
Translations.item_piquantpie_description: It takes some time and effort to make this pie, but the taste is well worth it.
Translations.item_powdereddragonegg_description: Dragon egg is a hard and difficult material to work with, yet here it has been ground to a fine, glittering dust...
Translations.item_proustitepowder_description: This unstable powder packs great potential.
Translations.item_pukeberries_description: Allows the consumer to quickly evacuate any misplaced meal and start anew.
Translations.item_pungentpebble_description: An earthy odour clings to these dried lumps. It's best to not think too hard about what they are.
Translations.item_queen_drop_description: Placeholder item for Seeker Queen item drop.
Translations.item_queensjam_description: That classic tasty blend of raspberries and blueberries.
Translations.item_resin_description: Sticky tree resin which insulates well. If put to the flame it burns slow and steady.
Translations.item_roastedcrustpie_description: This dessert keeps you going all day long.
Translations.item_root_description: An old root from an ancient tree stump. It feels both flexible and durable at the same time.
Translations.item_royaljelly_description: Jelly fit for kings and queens.
Translations.item_saddleasksvin_description: The back of an asksvin is rather lumpy, so you'll need a saddle if you want to ride one.
Translations.item_saddlelox_description: Use on a lox to be able to ride it.
Translations.item_sap_description: Sacred blood from the Great Tree.
Translations.item_scorchingmedley_description: A varied diet is important, so why not try this vegetarian option?
Translations.item_scythe_description: The right tool makes the task at hand so much easier.
Translations.item_scythehandle_description: A sturdy base for a tool.
Translations.item_seekeraspic_description: A quivering jelly with a taste like gentle electricity.
Translations.item_seekerqueen_drop_description: Her majesty's will was hard and unrelenting, but this piece of carapace is perhaps even more so.
Translations.item_serpentmeat_description: A slice of sea serpent. Smells fishy.
Translations.item_serpentmeatcooked_description: A cooked slice of sea serpent. Smells good.
Translations.item_serpentscale_description: The shiny metal-like scale from a sea serpent.
Translations.item_sharpeningstone_description: A whetstone wheel ready to spin.
Translations.item_shield_banded_description: Banded with hoops of iron, a true warrior's companion.
Translations.item_shield_blackmetal_description: Fashioned from the strongest metal, able to turn even the deadliest blades.
Translations.item_shield_blackmetal_tower_description: A tower shield of gleaming dark metal.
Translations.item_shield_bonetower_description: The bones of dead warriors make for a good protection.
Translations.item_shield_bronzebuckler_description: A shield of burnished bronze, good to turn a blade or two.
Translations.item_shield_carapace_description: The almost unbreakable carapace of your enemies makes an excellent shield.
Translations.item_shield_carapacebuckler_description: The skull of a seeker is solid but not heavy, which makes it perfect for a small and agile shield.
Translations.item_shield_flametal_description: The shield is and always will be a viking's most important weapon.
Translations.item_shield_flametal_tower_description: The best defence is a great defence.
Translations.item_shield_iron_square_description: An iron sword-breaker, tile of the battle-wall.
Translations.item_shield_iron_tower_description: A tall shield of strong iron.
Translations.item_shield_ironbuckler_description: Its lightness and curved center makes it excellent for deflecting attacks.
Translations.item_shield_knight_description: A wooden shield reinforced with iron. UNUSED
Translations.item_shield_serpentscale_description: A sturdy shield of overlapping scales.
Translations.item_shield_woodtower_description: A rough but heavy wooden shield.
Translations.item_shieldcore_description: A protective force within is ready to be unleashed.
Translations.item_silver_description: A bar of pure silver ready to be worked.
Translations.item_silverore_description: Unrefined silver. Needs to be refined in a smelter.
Translations.item_sizzlingberrybroth_description: This soup settles in your stomach with an almost tingly sensation.
Translations.item_sledge_demolisher_description: This mighty sledge yearns to wreak havoc.
Translations.item_sledge_iron_description: A mighty hammer, worthy of a champion.
Translations.item_sledge_wood_description: This should probably hurt more than it does.
Translations.item_smokebomb_description: Everyone knows you can't breathe in the smoke.
Translations.item_smokepuff_description: Hopefully it tastes better after cooking.
Translations.item_softtissue_description: It still fizzes softly with ancient memories.
Translations.item_sparkler_description: It's a stick that sparkles. Pretty!
Translations.item_sparklingshroomshake_description: Perhaps it's not the best flavour to start the day with, but it will give you the boost you need.
Translations.item_spear_ancientbark_description: Despite its gnarled look, this spear is strong and perfectly balanced.
Translations.item_spear_bronze_description: A sturdy spear with a head of burnished bronze.
Translations.item_spear_carapace_description: Sharpened to jagged perfection, this spear is sure to be deadly.
Translations.item_spear_flint_description: If your eye marks a thing for death, let your arm send the messenger.
Translations.item_spear_splitner_blood_description: A small sacrifice must be made for every battle...
Translations.item_spear_splitner_description: Split your enemies' hearts in two.
Translations.item_spear_splitner_lightning_descriptio: Let the crack of thunder split the air.
Translations.item_spear_splitner_nature_description: Nature's forces burst through the ground wherever this spear strikes.
Translations.item_spear_wolffang_description: Even in death, the wolf's tooth aches for flesh.
Translations.item_spear_wood_description: This is just as sharp as a real spear, if a real spear was made out of wood.
Translations.item_spiceashlands_description: Whatever spices have been used in this blend, they must come from someplace hot. And as if that wasn't enough, they have also been dried and smoked before being ground into a fine powder.
Translations.item_spiceforests_description: Thyme and marjoram carefully harvested and dried, before being mixed together. This blend will turn even the most basic of ingredients into a delicious feast.
Translations.item_spicemistlands_description: A good herbalist knows exactly where to go to find ramsons, but she won't tell you the secrets of her trade! Still, if you have the coin for it you may treat yourself to this blend of finely harvested ramson bulbs and leaves.
Translations.item_spicemountains_description: Only the most seasoned herbalist can find the pepperwood tree and harvest its leaves and bark. After careful preparation it's ready to be added to food, and is sure to give it some warming heat.
Translations.item_spiceoceans_description: The sour tang of sorrel, mixed with something the herbalist would rather not disclose, is well suitable for fish. Any fisherfolk worth their salt would do well to keep this blend near, in case of a good catch!
Translations.item_spiceplains_description: This blend utilises all aspects of the lovage plant, a rarity in the tenth world. Roots, leaves and seeds have all been gathered, and then mixed together in the perfect quantity.
Translations.item_spicymarmalade_description: Sugary honey perfectly balanced with tangy fronds and tart berries.
Translations.item_staff_lightning_description: What happens next may shock you.
Translations.item_staffclusterbomb_description: Only those with patience and focus will be able to harness the true power of this staff.
Translations.item_stafffireball_description: The sweltering heat of Muspelheim seems almost pathetic when compared to what this staff can do...
Translations.item_staffgreenroots_description: Ancient natural forces lie curled and dormant within this staff, ready to be unleashed.
Translations.item_stafficeshards_description: A staff as cold as the three-year winter that will herald the end of times.
Translations.item_staffredlightning_description: What happens next may shock you.
Translations.item_staffredtroll_description: Summons a raging beast to cause death and destruction.
Translations.item_staffshield_description: For a slight blood offering it will protect the caster in a magical shell.
Translations.item_staffskeleton_description: Sacrifice a bit of blood to raise the dead. Upgrade the skull to spawn multiple skeletons, and increase your blood magic to make them stronger.
Translations.item_stagbreaker_description: A weapon worthy of the Gods! If you get hit with this, you'll know it...
Translations.item_sword_blackmetal_description: A thing of death and beauty. It catches the light with a greenish glow.
Translations.item_sword_dyrnwyn_description: The sword that was broken is whole once more. Its flames burn hot, fuelled by the memories of ancient warriors.
Translations.item_sword_fire_description: Unsheathed, it sizzles and spits with deathless fire, an impossible blade.
Translations.item_sword_iron_description: The straight line between life and death runs along the edge of this blade.
Translations.item_sword_krom_description: As deadly as it is shiny, and it's very shiny.
Translations.item_sword_mistwalker_description: The faint glow seems to slice through the mist.
Translations.item_sword_niedhogg_blood_description: If you bleed, your foes are sure to do so as well.
Translations.item_sword_niedhogg_description: Named after the evil dragon that dwells by the roots of the world tree, this sword heralds doom for those who cross its path.
Translations.item_sword_niedhogg_lightning_descriptio: The power of lightning dances along the blade of this sword, a promise of the pain to come.
Translations.item_sword_niedhogg_nature_description: Tangle your foes in roots, like the namesake of this blade.
Translations.item_sword_silver_description: Purest of metals, nothing unclean can abide its touch.
Translations.item_sword_slayer_blood_description: If it bleeds, you can kill it.
Translations.item_sword_slayer_description: This mighty blade thirsts for the blood of foes.
Translations.item_sword_slayer_lightning_description: The lightning bound into this blade is erratic, ever searching for something to strike.
Translations.item_sword_slayer_nature_description: The blade works in tandem with the primal forces of the world, seeking death and slaughter.
Translations.item_sword_sword_2h_description: Would you be careful with that, please?
Translations.item_sword_wood_description: Mostly harmless, unless you're very persistent.
Translations.item_tankard_anniversary_description: One year since we arrived... Skål!
Translations.item_tankard_odin_description: Odin's finest warriors deserve the finest drinks.
Translations.item_tin_description: A bar of pure tin ready to be worked.
Translations.item_tinore_description: Unrefined tin. Needs to be refined in a smelter.
Translations.item_torch_description: It brings light and warmth, drives back the darkness.
Translations.item_trinketblackdamagedealth_descriptio: Your mind hardens, as do your blows.
Translations.item_trinketblackdtamina_description: Dance with death as you dodge your enemies' strikes.
Translations.item_trinketbronzehealth_description: It pulsates with fragments of ancient life.
Translations.item_trinketbronzestamina_description: A beautiful pendant, harbouring the endurance of a bear.
Translations.item_trinketcarapaceeitr_description: If you listen carefully, you can hear the faint echoes of lost souls...
Translations.item_trinketchitinswim_description: Empty your mind as you become shapeless and one with the water.
Translations.item_trinketflametalstaminahealth_descri: It's warm, as if filled with a lifesblood of its own.
Translations.item_trinketironstamina_description: Puts a spring in your step!
Translations.item_trinketscalestaminadamage_descripti: A razor-sharp ankle chain. Can it truly be comfortable?
Translations.item_trinketsilverdamage_description: Assume the sharp and furious mind of a wolf.
Translations.item_trinketsilverresist_description: A shard of frozen sorrow. Touching it makes you feel almost numb.
Translations.item_trollhide_description: A thick and sturdy hide. This is why trolls are so hard to kill.
Translations.item_trophy_abomination_description: It's been dead so long that it started living again.
Translations.item_trophy_abomination_lore: It's been dead so long that it started living again.
Translations.item_trophy_asksvin_description: Don't let yourself be fooled by the friendly smile, for it could easily bite your arm off.
Translations.item_trophy_asksvin_lore: A mighty beast, but now it shall roam no more.
Translations.item_trophy_bjorn_lore: Mistakenly, it believed itself the master of the forest.
Translations.item_trophy_bjorn_undead_description: These eyes are finally vacant for good.
Translations.item_trophy_bjorn_undead_lore: The most dreaded shadow of the night.
Translations.item_trophy_blob_description: A smelly lump of sticky matter.
Translations.item_trophy_blob_lore: A smelly lump of sticky matter.
Translations.item_trophy_boar_description: This boar head would make for a nice decoration in any house.
Translations.item_trophy_boar_lore: This boar head would make for a nice decoration in any house.
Translations.item_trophy_bonemass_description: Bones and viscous goo, held together by some unseen force. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_bonemass_lore: A mess of black soil and old bone, thankfully quiet now.
Translations.item_trophy_bonemaw_description: A skull made up of dense bone, as dangerous as it is protective.
Translations.item_trophy_bonemaw_lore: These jagged teeth had been the death of many a seafarer, before the beast finally met its own end.
Translations.item_trophy_brutebro_lore: The younger of two brothers. Jealous of his brother's magic.
Translations.item_trophy_charredarcher_description: These legs could hold infinite power.
Translations.item_trophy_charredmage_description: A warm glow seems to almost emanate from within. Handle with care.
Translations.item_trophy_charredmage_lore: If you listen closely, you can still hear the faint hum of magic.
Translations.item_trophy_charredmelee_description: Fractures line this skull, as if it has taken many hits over the years.
Translations.item_trophy_charredmelee_lore: Even in death, its gaze is unrelenting.
Translations.item_trophy_cultist_description: The fire in its eyes has still not burned out.
Translations.item_trophy_cultist_hildir_description: He's giving you an icy stare.
Translations.item_trophy_cultist_hildir_lore: Isolated from his kin for embracing the white frost instead of resisting it.
Translations.item_trophy_cultist_lore: The fire in its eyes has still not burned out.
Translations.item_trophy_deathsquito_description: You don't like touching this thing even when it's dead.
Translations.item_trophy_deathsquito_lore: You don't like touching this thing even when it's dead.
Translations.item_trophy_deer_description: A fine specimen but you'll need to kill more than deer to enter Valhalla.
Translations.item_trophy_deer_lore: A fine specimen but you'll need to kill more than deer to enter Valhalla.
Translations.item_trophy_dragonqueen_description: The head of a dragon, majestic even in the rigor of death. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_dragonqueen_lore: Scored with ancient scars, this head was the last sight of countless warriors.
Translations.item_trophy_draugr_description: Bind up the mouth if it starts to whisper in the night...
Translations.item_trophy_draugr_lore: Bind up the mouth if it starts to whisper in the night...
Translations.item_trophy_draugrelite_description: The dead stare of the glowing red eyes sends a shiver through your bones.
Translations.item_trophy_draugrelite_lore: The dead stare of the glowing red eyes sends a shiver through your bones.
Translations.item_trophy_dvergr_description: It's frankly a little troubling that you would consider hanging these on your wall...
Translations.item_trophy_eikthyr_description: This severed head oozes power. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_eikthyr_lore: Once the king of the forest, the size of the antlers are truly impressive.
Translations.item_trophy_elder_description: This severed head oozes power. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_elder_lore: Even in death, it seems to grin with secret knowledge.
Translations.item_trophy_fader_description: The green dragon, corrupted beyond redemption. Offer him to the sacrificial stones.
Translations.item_trophy_fader_lore: Only tatters remained of his sane mind. Perhaps it was a mercy to kill him.
Translations.item_trophy_fallenvalkyrie_description: Though she is dead, she yearns for the blood to flow.
Translations.item_trophy_fallenvalkyrie_lore: Once a fierce and noble being, before she was warped into a harbinger of terror.
Translations.item_trophy_fenring_description: Half-way between wolf and man, its face frozen in a snarl of pain.
Translations.item_trophy_fenring_lore: Half-way between wolf and man, its face frozen in a snarl of pain.
Translations.item_trophy_foresttroll_description: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Translations.item_trophy_foresttroll_lore: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Translations.item_trophy_frosttroll_description: The eyes still glitter and swirl with silvery flecks. Don't look into them for too long...
Translations.item_trophy_frosttroll_lore: The eyes still glitter and swirl with silvery flecks. Don't look into them for too long...
Translations.item_trophy_ghost_description: Does it still whisper about unfinished business?
Translations.item_trophy_ghost_lore: There is still something haunting about its presence...
Translations.item_trophy_goblin_description: Loose folds of greenish skin gathered in around a pair of dark and hateful eyes.
Translations.item_trophy_goblin_lore: Loose folds of greenish skin gathered in around a pair of dark and hateful eyes.
Translations.item_trophy_goblinbrute_description: The huge grizzled head is as heavy as a boulder.
Translations.item_trophy_goblinbrute_lore: The huge grizzled head is as heavy as a boulder.
Translations.item_trophy_goblinking_description: The crownless head of a dead king. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_goblinking_lore: Sometimes, the eyes still move and the lips mutter silently...
Translations.item_trophy_goblinshaman_description: Even killing it couldn't wipe the knowing smile from its crooked lips...
Translations.item_trophy_goblinshaman_lore: Even killing it couldn't wipe the knowing smile from its crooked lips...
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarf_description: The mossy, severed head of a Greydwarf.
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarf_lore: The mossy, severed head of a Greydwarf.
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarfbrute_description: It took seven blows to hack this gnarled head from its body.
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarfbrute_lore: It took seven blows to hack this gnarled head from its body.
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarfshaman_description: It may try to come back so be sure to prune any new shoots...
Translations.item_trophy_greydwarfshaman_lore: It may try to come back so be sure to prune any new shoots...
Translations.item_trophy_hare_description: These are said to bring luck. But not for their original owner.
Translations.item_trophy_hare_lore: These are said to bring luck. But not for their original owner.
Translations.item_trophy_leech_description: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Translations.item_trophy_leech_lore: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Translations.item_trophy_lox_description: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Translations.item_trophy_lox_lore: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Translations.item_trophy_morgen_description: The waking nightmare has met its end.
Translations.item_trophy_morgen_lore: Only the most twisted of minds could summon such a creature.
Translations.item_trophy_neck_description: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Translations.item_trophy_neck_lore: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Translations.item_trophy_seeker_brute_description: The head of a fallen champion.
Translations.item_trophy_seeker_brute_lore: The head of a fallen champion.
Translations.item_trophy_seeker_description: Less delicate than they look. The leather of the wings catches the firelight as if remembering flight.
Translations.item_trophy_seeker_lore: Less delicate than they look. The leather of the wings catches the firelight as if remembering flight.
Translations.item_trophy_seekerqueen_description: She has seen enough. Offer it to the Sacrificial Stones.
Translations.item_trophy_serpent_description: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Translations.item_trophy_serpent_lore: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Translations.item_trophy_sgolem_description: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Translations.item_trophy_sgolem_lore: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Translations.item_trophy_shamanbro_description: In the choice of 'ride or die', he picked the latter.
Translations.item_trophy_shamanbro_lore: The elder brother. Wished he had his brother's strength.
Translations.item_trophy_skeleton_description: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Translations.item_trophy_skeleton_hildir_lore: Her rage burned so hot it stayed with her after death.
Translations.item_trophy_skeleton_lore: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Translations.item_trophy_skeletonpoison_description: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Translations.item_trophy_skeletonpoison_lore: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Translations.item_trophy_surtling_description: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Translations.item_trophy_surtling_lore: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Translations.item_trophy_troll_description: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Translations.item_trophy_troll_lore: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Translations.item_trophy_ulv_description: A rugged tail from a not so good boy.
Translations.item_trophy_ulv_lore: A rugged tail from a not so good boy.
Translations.item_trophy_volture_description: It's like a vulture, but it thrives in volcanic climates.
Translations.item_trophy_volture_lore: Its watchful eyes still seem to search for cadavers to feast upon.
Translations.item_trophy_wolf_description: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Translations.item_trophy_wolf_lore: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Translations.item_trophy_wraith_description: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Translations.item_trophy_wraith_lore: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Translations.item_turnip_description: A dense vegetable, rich with nutrition.
Translations.item_turnipseeds_description: Plant to grow a healthy turnip.
Translations.item_turretbolt_description: These thick missiles can punch through the hide of even the toughest foes.
Translations.item_turretbolt_flametal_description: Forged from one of the hardest metals in all of Valheim, this missile is sure to hold off your enemies.
Translations.item_turretboltwood_description: Sturdy wooden missiles that can provide a tough defense against foes.
Translations.item_UndeadBjornRibcage_description: A relic of savage strength, perfect for forging armour that bears the wild’s fury.
Translations.item_vineberry_description: These juicy berries are both sour and sweet.
Translations.item_vineberryseeds_description: Looks like they could crumble at any moment.
Translations.item_vinegreenseeds_description: These unassuming seeds can grow into vines that might overtake entire buildings.
Translations.item_volture_meat_cooked_description: A chewy and somewhat dry meat. Some seasoning would probably make it taste better, but it'll fill your stomach regardless.
Translations.item_volture_meat_description: Given that this bird feasts on all kinds of things, you'd better cook its meat before you even think about eating it.
Translations.item_voltureegg_description: Warm to the touch, and full of protein.
Translations.item_wishbone_description: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Translations.item_witheredbone_description: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Translations.item_wolfclaw_description: It is hard and sharp like iron.
Translations.item_wolfhairbundle_description: A bundle of thick, rough hair. It has a strong smell.
Translations.item_wood_description: Good, strong wood to build with.
Translations.item_yagluththing_description: The remains of Yagluth, a twisted spirit torn between this world and the next.
Translations.item_yggdrasilporridge_description: Made with sap from the great tree. Even a mouthful imparts a warm glow to your whole body.
Translations.item_yggdrasilwood_description: Godflesh, wood from the Great Tree.
Translations.item_ymirremains_description: The earthy remains of the giant Ymir.
